author: ndaci
body:
Backport from 76X (#10907,#10974, #11219).
New PR instead of #11048 (same change but rebased).
title: Fixed path names. Removed pt2 and pt3 in unnecessary cases. Added debug print (dump # of HLT passed events). Replace "cout" to DebugLog. Updated PhotonMET, PureMET, DiPhoton and HighPtPhoton paths.
